item.description:
A couple of us were talking about going to this movie, and apparently everybody else prefers to go on Wednesday, so I've changed the date.  Here is information about the film:

http://www.realartways.org/cinema.htm#sholem-aleichem

 

"A riveting profile of the great writer whose stories became the basis of the Broadway musical Fiddler on the Roof."  The showings are 5:30pm and 7:30pm; I chose the later time as I'm not out of work by 5:30pm.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Sholem Aleichem: Laughing in the Darkness"
